question: The software launched in Rajasthan for presumptive diagnosis and monitoring of seasonal and non-communicable diseases is;
explanation: A new software, 'Nidaan', has been launched in Rajasthan for presumptive diagnosis and monitoring of seasonal and non-communicable diseases. "Nidaan" will facilitate online entries of as many as 46 diseases and healthcare services available for their treatment in different institutions. It is expected to help in formulation of specific action plans for control of diseases.
